text: Covington pizza hut is the worst pizza hut I've ever been to in my life! The service and the food was beyond awful! Clifton Forge pizza hut on the other hand is amazing! Their service was terrific and their food was great. In essence,they actually care about their customers needs.

text: Stuff was sitting on the tables for the whole time we were in there, they do not know how to properly serve customers. Ever since I walked in to the place it was dirty and the tables were left with plates and trash in them. It wasn’t a pleasant experience I wouldn’t return.
